detail_desc: Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover at the top, decorative gathers along the shoulder seams and a gathered seam at the waist. Long sleeves and cuffs with metal buttons. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the back of the neck and an open back. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a seam at the waist with ties at the back, and a gently flared skirt.
Trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit cardigan in a merino wool blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.

Maxi dress in an airy modal weave with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with gathered seams and a decorative tie detail, seam with a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with notch lapels, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs with elasticated hems.
Ankle boots in soft imitation suede with a concealed zip in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
V-neck top in satin with a small frill trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Deep, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a round neck and decorative flounces at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves.

Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the waist. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Sewn-on belt with a decorative buckle to define the waist, and medium coverage at the back.
Scarf in soft woven fabric with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 40x160 cm.
Short wrapover coat in woven fabric with draped lapels, a concealed press-stud, pockets in the side seams, a single back vent and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patterned lining.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and laser-cut scalloped edges.
Jumper in a soft knit decorated with beads. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a lace-covered yoke at the front, a button placket and decorative gathers at the front. Long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and ribbed hems.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, decorative chest pockets and front pockets with a metal button. No buttons. Lined.

Set with a vest top, T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and narrow trim around the neckline. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and flatlock seams.
Knee-length skirt in satin with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a slit at the front. Unlined.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the shoulders and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with frills around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam and bow at the waist.

Thin outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved jersey top with lace at the back. Open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is partly recycled.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, a detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with a lace-covered V-neck and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
Set with an Alice band and wand. Satin-covered Alice band decorated with a glittery witch’s hat and tulle bow. Wand with a bat made of glittery felt and tulle with satin ribbons.
Short, boxy jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front and short, wide sleeves.
Round earrings in metal painted in various colours.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in creases front and back that flare from the knee down.
Long tunic in soft cotton twill with a button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Block-coloured jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an appliqué on the front. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and diagonal front pockets. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in jersey. Printed top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dress with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a concealed single-button fastening at the front. Jersey lining.
Round metal earrings with a suspended hoop decorated with sparkly stones. Length 7.5 cm. Diameter 4 cm.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Slightly longer at the back.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.
Short, straight-cut blouse in a linen weave with a wide neckline, covered buttons down the front and long balloon sleeves.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Cropped, sleeveless top in sturdy, double-layered jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and soft side support.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.

Suit trousers in woven fabric. Extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a concealed zip at the back and a detachable tie belt with a fabric-covered metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Longer shirt in lightweight, checked viscose flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short, hooded jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and frayed, raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a nepped texture. Unlined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy-style hooded top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
